attributes.additional_details:
With petrol and diesel prices rising through the roof, and many households are feeling the pinch when they go to fill up. We have no choice but to pay the high prices because we need to commute.

Stop us being held to ransom by the fuel companies and set a maximum price they can charge for fuel. A £1.00 limit would raise moral for everyone in the country and also leave them with more money to spend back in the economy.
